text: Zero Day is an American political thriller television series created by Eric Newman, Noah Oppenheim, and Michael Schmidt for Netflix. It was directed by Lesli Linka Glatter. It stars Robert De Niro, Lizzy Caplan, Jesse Plemons, Joan Allen, Connie Britton, Bill Camp, Dan Stevens, McKinley Belcher III and Angela Bassett with Matthew Modine. It is about a former U.S. President investigating a cyberattack in the United States. The series was released on Netflix on February 20, 2025 to mixed reviews. ==References== Category:2020s American drama television series Category:Netflix original series
title: Zero Day (American TV series)
